QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when resources_vpc_config ->> 'EndpointPublicAccess' = 'true' then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when resources_vpc_config ->> 'EndpointPublicAccess' = 'true' then title || ' endpoint publicly accessible.'
    else title || ' endpoint not publicly accessible.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_eks_cluster;
